vsParam:
Boohoo... Speaking of apples,
I can't help thinking about Colseit...

I really want to eat them...
The apple-picking season already started, right?

Oh!? P-Peppermint!
I'm sorry. I didn't notice you guys...

That's alright. Look!
These are the apples we picked this morning!

We chose them carefully to meet your standard ♪
We took a close look at each and every one of them like this!
Er. Lost in comparing those apples, [px] even fell off a tree!
To make Escha happy, this is nothing!

Be careful...
What if you get hurt!

Haha...
It's good you didn't get hurt.

We can guarantee the flavor!
Let's try the apples together, huh?

Er...
Uh, hmm, maybe... next time...

Hmm, we failed!?
Can't apples in Albus impress Escha...

I-I'm... sorry.
You picked apples for me, but I...

No, you don't have to apologize. It's natural for you
to get upset when you are in a new world.

But I hope that Escha can brace herself up.
If apples are no good, er...

Why don't we use these apples to make desserts?
Yummy things can bring vitality!

So, Escha,
can you save room for apple dessert and wait a moment, you glutton?

Alright! Let's make apple tarts!
First we need to pick more and better apples!

Escha! Sorry to make you wait, here come the apple tarts!
Not to brag, but these apple tarts are the finest we ever made!

They may not be as good as Colseit's apples,
but everybody played a part in making them for you.

You guys made it specially for me...
Thanks!

Compare... You are right! [px] and you guys,
thank you for taking your time out to care for me!

Alright, it's our pleasure ♪
Eat them while they are warm!

... Ah uh,
Er... ah, that's, so delicious!

Wonderful! We worked really hard
just to hear you say this!

Yes! Sorel always ate too much during sample tasting,
and we ran out of ingredients several times!

B-big mouth!
Don't say it... out loud!

Ah, ha-ha-ha!
That's why they are so delicious!

Escha!
Great! You are vibrant again!

Hee hee... To be honest, I still miss
Colseit's apples.

But, I get to eat such delicious apples in a different world,
and you guys made wonderful desserts to cheer me up...
Ah, may I ask... are there some tarts left?

No! I'm not a glutton!
But the apple tarts are too good!

Ha-ha! Make some tea then,
and we could sit down and slowly savor them ♪
